nodes.text: Shalu was a female Chiss who served the Sith Empire as a quartermaster during the Great Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. During the conflict, she worked selling equipment in the supplies section on board the space station Vaiken Spacedock, which was located within the Imperial fleet. Shalu wore white and black armor including a mask, and alsocarried a datapad and a blaster rifle. The Chiss had blue skin and black hair.

Shalu was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game she serves as an Imperial classic gear vendor within the Imperial fleet. She was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
